lead_paragraph: GREGG--James-Scot Zachary. It is with heavy hearts that we announce the death of James-Scot Zachary Gregg, 33, of Brooklyn, New York. A fixture in the neighborhood of Clinton Hill, many had the good fortune of being graced by his exuberance, warmth, and bright spirit. He is survived by family members Kelly Wolfgramm, Julia Gregg, Vicki Snyder, Jamia Dixon, Annie Dixon, Gregg Hood, Judy Hood, James Gregg, the James A. Hightower family, and many dear friends throughout New York City and the world. He will be sorely missed. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GREGG, JAMES, SCOT ZACHARY
